title: riot player communication
body:
im just wondering what the point of forums/ comments sections are because our opinions obviously don't mean anything. riot have made a lot of changes this season, and a lot of them have been disliked but riot refuse to listen and keep telling us that they dont care. the biggest being dynamic queue, after a huge negative out cry they still told us that they're keeping it because normals apparently don't exist to play with friends. they even had an interview with scarra and gbay who said that it was an awful system but riot still try to say that its a good system. many well known content creators and high elo streamers have decided to quit because of the way leagues going but riot pretend that that isnt happening as well.

sorry for long salt post just venting my frustration of trying to play solo and having 30 MINUTE QUEUES IN BRONZE or playing against/ with dynamic queues.

tldr riot start listening to your community
